extDescription: Chrome için EN İYİ ana sayfa. Çarpıcı temalar, onlarca eklenti, inanılmaz hız, çılgınca özelleştirilebilir!
newtabDescription: Chrome için EN İYİ ana sayfa. Artık yeni sekme için. Çarpıcı temalar, onlarca eklenti, inanılmaz hız, çılgınca özelleştirilebilir!

hide_ad.content: Hey! We're not crazy about ads either, but we're only able to make iChrome available and continue developing features for our free users (that's you!) by showing ads. If you'd like to support iChrome directly and get rid of ads for free, we would really appreciate if you upgraded to our pro version

modal.tagline: Kullandığınız bütün siteler ve uygulamalar tek bir yerde
modal.wrong_extension: Yeni sekme sayfasında iChrome ister misin?
modal.wrong_extension_newtab: Ana sayfanızın iChrome olmasını ister misin?
modal.about_desc: Sekmeler widgedlarla dolu sayfalardır - Hava durumu, haberler ve emaillerinizi gizler. Widgetlarınızı düzenleyebilir ve istediğiniz daha bir çok widget ekleyebilirsiniz.
modal.terms: Devam etmekle, iChrome'un Hükümler ve Koşullarını kabul etmiş sayılırsınız
modal.sign_in_desc: Güvenli bir şekilde ayarlarınızı değiştirmeden önce Google hesabınızla giriş yapın.
modal.sign_in_desc2: İsterseniz giriş yapmayabilirsiniz, fakat sayfalarınız online olarak kaydedilmez ve siz başka bilgisayarlardan giriş yapıp değiştiremezsiniz.
modal.have_account: Zaten bir hesabınız var gibi görünüyor!
modal.have_account_desc: Tüm sekmeleri ve widgetları kullanmaya hazırsınız!

widgets.configure_desc: Hava durumu widget'ının ayarlarını değiştirmek için anahtara basın.
widgets.settings: Konumunuzu San Francisco, CA ile değiştirin, sonra Kaydet tuşuna basın.
widgets.move: You can drag widgets using the highlighted handle to move them.
widgets.remove: When dragging a widget, drop it on the red bar (not shown) to remove it.

settings.intro: Now let's take a look at the menu and see what else you can do.

tooltips.settings: Change the way iChrome looks and works
tooltips.widgets: Add new widgets - you can have as many as you want
tooltips.editing: Show or hide the editing buttons on widgets
tooltips.links: This is a list of links, add sites you use often in the settings
tooltips.tabs: These are your tabs. You can add more in the settings
tooltips.support: Send us a message or leave a review here

settings.finished_next: Choose an option from the menu (try starting with Widgets) and set your page up!
settings.finished_contact: Use the support link if you need any help and we'll get back to you ASAP.

storage.signin: Sign in with Google now to securely save and sync your configuration

signin_confirm.title: Keep local data?
signin_confirm.desc: Would you like to keep your local data, and replace the configuration in your account with it, or replace this computer's configuration with the one already in your account?

storage.signout_confirm: Signing out will erase your local backups
storage.pastdue_desc: Please update your billing information in the settings

toolbar.placeholder_ok: Aramak istediğiniz kelimeyi girin veya "OK, Google" deyin

suggestions.capture_notice: iChrome handles searches you normally make from the Omnibox. You can disable this at any time from the settings

background.title: Background
background.desc: This is the image or set of images shown as a background to your tabs

layout.title: Düzen
layout.desc: Here you can adjust the type and number of columns in each tab

column_warning.column_to_grid: Changing to a grid-based layout will move all of your widgets to the top left corner.
column_warning.grid_to_column: Changing to a column-based layout will move all of your widgets to the first column.

theme.title: App theme
theme.desc: The app theme controls the style of iChrome itself and all widgets

style.title: Style
style.desc: This controls the style of the toolbar.  It can either appear normally or as an out of the way button

search.title: Ara
search.desc: These settings control how the search box and voice search function
search.engines_custom_desc: Enter a URL that queries should be sent to, with %s where the query should go.
search.omnibox_capture: Handle searches normally made in the Omnibox
search.search_tab: Open search results in a new tab

links.title: Links
links.desc: These are the items shown at the right of the toolbar

misc.link_tab: Open links in a new tab by default

tabs.desc1: Tabs are pages inside iChrome. Each tab has its own set of widgets that is completely separate from every other tab.
tabs.desc2: You can switch between tabs by clicking the buttons that appear at the left and right of the screen when you move your mouse over a tab or by using the arrow keys on your keyboard.
tabs.delete_confirm: This action is irreversible. All data from all widgets in the tab will be permanently lost.

status.title: Status
status.signed_out: You are not currently signed in. Sign in with your Google account now to securely store and sync your configuration.

accounts.reset_confirm_desc: This will erase all local and synced data, there is no backup and no way to undo this.
accounts.reset_confirm_desc2: You will lose your entire current configuration on all computers connected to this account.

backups.title: Backup and restore
backups.desc: Backups are complete copies of all your tabs, settings, and widgets. They're automatically created when you first open iChrome each day.
backups.desc2: Use the buttons below to roll iChrome back to a particular date or download one of your backups.
backups.restore_confirm: This will overwrite all local and synced data. You will lose your entire current configuration on all computers under this account.
backups.restore_error: An error occurred while trying to parse the provided data, please try again later.

css.title: Custom CSS
css.desc: You can use CSS (definition) to customize almost any part of iChrome.
css.placeholder: Enter up to 1000 characters of CSS here

debug_tools.title: Debug tools
debug_tools.desc: WARNING: These tools can erase your entire configuration in a single click. Only use them if your developer instructs you to.

widgets.desc1: Widgets have their own settings and can't be customized here.
widgets.desc2: To edit a widget's settings, follow these steps:
widgets.steps1: Move your mouse over any widget
widgets.steps2: Click the wrench icon that appears at the top right of the widget. If none appears then the widget doesn't have any settings that can be customized.
widgets.steps3: Edit any of the settings shown in the dialog that's displayed
widgets.steps4: Click Save to save your changes, or any part of the background to discard of them

promo.business: Interested in buying Pro for your business or school?
promo.themes_desc: See more of your backgrounds with dark and transparent themes
promo.bgs_desc: Bring your page to life with 20 live high-definition backgrounds
promo.widgets_desc: Take iChrome to another level with maximizable widgets
promo.stocks: Realtime stocks with extended and historical information
promo.rss: Support for multiple RSS feeds per widget
promo.weather: Hourly weather forecasts up to 10 days out

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.monthly_notice: By subscribing, you authorize iChrome to charge you $4.99 every month until you cancel your subscription.
checkout.yearly_notice: By subscribing, you authorize iChrome to charge you $29.99 every year until you cancel your subscription.
checkout.update_notice: Although billing cycle changes take effect immediately, you won't be charged until your current cycle ends.
checkout.thank_you: Thank you for buying iChrome Pro!
checkout.thank_you2: iChrome will reload in a few seconds and you'll be all set!
checkout.error: Something went wrong while trying to process your payment.
checkout.error2: Please try again later or email us at support@ichro.me
checkout.signin_desc: You need to sign in before buying Pro so we can make sure it's you

plan.title: Plan
plan.desc: You are currently subscribed to iChrome Pro (%s)
plan.uneditable_desc: Business, education, and custom plans cannot be updated from within iChrome. Please contact us to update or cancel your subscription.
plan.cancel_notice: Your subscription will be canceled immediately
plan.cancel_notice2: If you would like a refund, please contact us at support@ichro.me

ads.text1: iChrome displays a few small ads to pay for server, support and development costs. With these ads, we can afford to offer iChrome free to everyone.
ads.text2: Here you can choose where those ads are shown, or buy ad-free to permanently remove them.
ads.text3: Ad-free is a one-time purchase that permanently removes ads from iChrome wherever you're signed in. You can also upgrade to Pro for extra features in addition to an ad-free experience.
ads.already_upgraded: It looks like you've already upgraded to ad-free
ads.signin_desc: Sign in before upgrading so we can link your purchase to your account
ads.thank_you: Thank you for upgrading to ad-free!

store.instructions: Herhangi bir boyutu tutup ana sayfanızın üzerine sürükleyin

widgets.delete_confirm:
Bu widgeti silmek istediğinizden emin misiniz? 
Bu eylem geri alınamaz; Bu widgete ait tüm veriler kalıcı olarak kaybolacak.

permissions_request.title: Access required
permissions_request.desc: This widget needs extra permissions before it can be used. Grant them using the button below.

error.explanation: Something went wrong while we were trying to display this widget.
error.advice: Try reinstalling the widget or reloading the page. Contact us if you see this message often.

auth.message: You'll need to give this widget access to your account before you can use it.

settings.title: Widget başlığı
settings.title_placeholder: Widget için bir başlık girin veya gizlemek için boş bırakın
settings.account_help:
If you're signed into multiple accounts, this is the "authuser=" value.

For example, if you're signed into two accounts, jsmith1@gmail.com and jsmith2@gmail.com, the "authuser" value for jsmith2@gmail.com would be 1 since it's the second account (counting from zero) that you're signed into.

themes.title: Temalar
themes.author: Yapan
themes.cached: Bu tema önbelleğe alındı ve çevrimdışı kullanılabilir
themes.random: Bu tema sayfayı her yüklediğinizde rastgele bir resim gösterir
themes.random_daily: Bu tema her gün değişen rastgele bir resim gösterir
themes.sunrise_sunset: Bu tema günün saatine bağlı bir resim gösterir
themes.feed: This theme displays an image selected daily from an external feed
themes.video: This theme displays a live video
themes.pro_only: This theme is only available to Pro users. Buy Pro in the settings.
themes.delete_confirm:
Are you really sure you would like to delete this theme?
This action is irreversible; the entire theme will be permanently lost.
themes.delete_error: An error occurred while trying to delete the theme.  Please try again later.
themes.feed_error: Something went wrong while trying to fetch the feed.  Please try again later.
themes.cache_error: An error occurred while trying to cache the theme.  Please try again later

bginfo.pro_only: Only Pro users can download background images and videos

edit.title: Temayı Düzenle
edit.name: Tema Adı
edit.image_placeholder: Bir arka plan görüntüsü URL'si girin
edit.image_help:
Uploaded images cannot be synced between computers.

If this is important to you, please upload your image to a service such as imgur. Then copy the URL ending with an extension (i.e. .jpg) and paste it into the field on the left.
edit.cache_error: An error occurred while trying to cache the image you provided, please double-check the URL.
edit.upload_error: An error occurred while trying to upload the file you provided, please make sure that it's a reasonable size and an image.
